Caster.label: Ignore caster messages
Caster.tooltip: If enabled any messages from the caster will NOT trigger a sound!

Blacklist.label: Ignored Users
Blacklist.tooltip: Usernames to ignore, separated with comma

EventCooldown.label: Event Cooldown (min)
EventCooldown.tooltip:
Time since last message must be higher than this value for the sound to be played. 
Time in minutes.

EventTriggerMessage.label: Message displayed in chat

TestSound.label: Test Sound
TestSound.tooltip:
Test sound & volume!
Must save settings first!

SetDefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
SetDefaults.tooltip: Restores all script settings to the default ones!
